user.name: Gary Marcus
user.description: “In the aftermath of GPT-5’s launch … the views of critics like Marcus seem increasingly moderate.” —@newyorker

fullText:
You people are fools—and it shows.

Where do you think AI got its em dashes from—immaculate conception?

FFs, no—they got them from professional writers, who know how to use punctuation for emphasis.

I use them regularly—and started doing so long before LLMs were a thing.

i https://t.co/Nwf6AVXtzi

核心特点是智能体强化学习，除了像CoT模型一样思考外，还可以像智能体一样与外部环境交互，并根据反馈调整推理步骤

user.name: Ashish Khanna
user.description: Partner at @FrontierInvMgmt | JD, MBA, & CAP | Comprehensive Financial, Estate, & Legacy Planning | Building the Future, Today

fullText:
A quiet admission:

I’m deeply proud of the life I’ve helped build for my 8-year-old son.

But some nights, I lie awake…
Afraid I might ruin it all for him.

This is the paradox of abundance — and how I’m trying to navigate it as a parent.
